# Change Log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See Conventional Commitsopen in new window for commit guidelines.

# 2.0.0-beta.22open in new window (2021-07-11)

# Bug Fixes

  • plugin-active-header-links: update active header link selector (#259open in new window) (adaeed5open in new window)
  • theme-default: break long links on overflow (close #266open in new window) (#273open in new window) (eb970c3open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.21open in new window (2021-07-03)

# Bug Fixes

  • theme-default: fix nav glitch at exactly 719px screen width (#238open in new window) (3154fbbopen in new window)
  • theme-default: use default cursor on non-link sidebar items (ca22d4fopen in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.20open in new window (2021-06-26)

# Features

  • theme-default: refine sidebar config (ea7c4bbopen in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • theme-default: isGroup field of sidebar config is removed

# 2.0.0-beta.19open in new window (2021-06-19)

# Features

  • theme-default: support activeMatch in navbar config (ab0c6d1open in new window)
  • theme-default: support disabling dark mode (6517ce1open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.18open in new window (2021-06-12)

# Bug Fixes

  • theme-default: exclude h1 header in sidebar (280626dopen in new window)
  • theme-default: show outline of toggle-dark-button (bc94de0open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.17open in new window (2021-06-04)

# Bug Fixes

  • theme-default: avoid long inline code breaking the layout (#180open in new window) (ada2e2aopen in new window)
  • theme-default: fix error of sidebar resolving (close #185open in new window) (6a96af0open in new window)
  • theme-default: respect root-level custom container config (close #175open in new window) (f2ad5f0open in new window)

# Features

  • theme-default: improve a11y of CodeGroup (#163open in new window) (2b76463open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • theme-default: default title of danger container is changed to "DANGER"

# 2.0.0-beta.16open in new window (2021-05-28)

# Bug Fixes

  • theme-default: increase medium-zoom delay (9c92443open in new window)

# Features

  • plugin-medium-zoom: add more css variables (close #174open in new window) (d717800open in new window)
  • plugin-pwa-popup: add more css variables (3ae6f72open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.15open in new window (2021-05-27)

# Bug Fixes

  • theme-default: handle rotate events on iPad (#150open in new window) (bbdda60open in new window)
  • theme-default: show header anchors when being focused (#164open in new window) (8de5f0fopen in new window)

# Features

  • theme-default: support dark mode (close #29open in new window) (680e429open in new window)
  • theme-default: support full link for github repo (#152open in new window) (8a5055bopen in new window)
  • theme-default: support Gitee repo (5cad664open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • theme-default: most sass variables are migrated to css variables

# 2.0.0-alpha.1 (2020-12-01)

# Bug Fixes

  • theme-default: code-group nav padding (1d46ce0open in new window)
  • theme-default: code-group style in mobile (7e31bfdopen in new window)
  • theme-default: do not use frontmatter title and desc as hero messages (a3dde66open in new window)
  • theme-default: do not use injections inside computed (04c7de5open in new window)
  • theme-default: fallback home title and content to siteLocale (ce34b4aopen in new window)
  • theme-default: fix type imports and usages (f953295open in new window)
  • theme-default: hide contributors if array is empty (9e88016open in new window)
  • theme-default: remove default home config (21ebb4copen in new window)
  • theme-default: remove DropdownTransition temporarily (efd6dedopen in new window)
  • theme-default: resolve redirect with hash, query and params (e7b7a91open in new window)
  • theme-default: typo in template (9a72112open in new window)
  • theme-default: unregister the built-in OutboundLink component to avoid warning (9c781ccopen in new window)
  • theme-default: wrap Content with div (e578594open in new window)
  • theme-default: wrong default vertical-align of Badge (0c5d2efopen in new window)

# Features

  • theme-default: 404 page with locales support (08f6f9bopen in new window)
  • theme-default: add Page component (d2eb868open in new window)
  • theme-default: allow string type navbar and sidebar item (82d7fa2open in new window)
  • theme-default: default theme skeleton (fb1d413open in new window)
  • theme-default: display json extension in code blocks (d8795d4open in new window)
  • theme-default: migrate Badge component (b77bb29open in new window)
  • theme-default: migrate CodeGroup component (107afd8open in new window)
  • theme-default: migrate NavLink component (8bb1e17open in new window)
  • theme-default: migrate OutboundLink component (c7ddba4open in new window)
  • theme-default: migrate styles (4bb6e10open in new window)
  • theme-default: navbar and sidebar (7f22ac0open in new window)
  • theme-default: optimize sidebar items config (f70cdf0open in new window)
  • theme-default: support locale config for custom containers (404e02dopen in new window)
  • theme-default: use active-header-links plugin (f7990a2open in new window)
  • theme-default: use container plugin and refactor types (55e0940open in new window)
  • theme-default: use Debug component in Layout (fe4334fopen in new window)
  • theme-default: use docsearch plugin (c601312open in new window)
  • theme-default: use medium-zoom plugin (6288f8copen in new window)
  • theme-default: use nprogress plugin (e662753open in new window)
  • theme-default: use palette-stylus plugin (ccaee0fopen in new window)
  • theme-default: use plugin-back-to-top (774f95bopen in new window)
  • theme-default: use plugin-git and add themePlugins option (f44570bopen in new window)
